metadata.synopsis: The player has given blood to the Infernal Vendor to make a unique potion. Once this potion is used, the player who gave the blood will feel sick after long rest (applying a debuff).The potion's effect depends on the player, but the debuff is universal.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Infernal Merchant at Moonrise (Araj Oblodra)Inquire her special offer and provide the bloodUse the potion receivedTrigger a long rest

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Ugh. That potion... did not go down well.
